name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Innovative and detail-oriented Senior Rust Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software engineering, adept at leveraging **Rust**, **gRPC**, and **cryptography** to develop secure and high-performance applications. Proficient in building robust systems utilizing **RocksDB** and **tonic** for efficient data storage and communication, while demonstrating a strong understanding of **TCP** and **QUIC** protocols.

Experienced in the healthcare and financial industries, proficient in developing compliance-driven solutions aligned with industry standards. Demonstrated ability in cybersecurity measures to protect applications against vulnerabilities. Strong foundation in AI/ML technologies, including expertise with cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing microservices and CI/CD practices.
